The FLOE metadata editor will generate accessibility metadata and other metadata automatically based on user's actions.

A listing of the metadata to be generated is specified here:\
<http://wiki.fluidproject.org/display/fluid/%28Floe%29+Supported+Metadata+Schemas+for+Metadata+Authoring+Demo>
